column1: larry gene ""mickey"" byrd| larry gene mickey byrd
column4: of gurley passed away tuesday at his residence. mickey was a native and lifelong resident of madison county. he was employed as a delivery driver for buffalo rock for 25 years. survivors include his son: dalton gene byrd; one step-son: tanner lee hicks; his mother: glenda faye byrd; two brothers: timothy martin byrd and brian keith (donna) byrd and a number of nieces
column5: nephews and other family and friends. the family will receive friends sunday from 4:00 p. m. until 6:00 p. m. at berryhill funeral home.
